verses.text: Then went Boaz up to the gate , and sat him down there: and, behold, the kinsman of whom Boaz spake came by; unto whom he said , Ho , such a one ! turn aside , sit down here. And he turned aside , and sat down.
And he took ten men of the elders of the city , and said , Sit ye down here. And they sat down.
And he said unto the kinsman , Naomi , that is come again out of the country of Moab , selleth a parcel of land , which \add was\add* our brother Elimelech’s :

And I thought to advertise thee, saying , Buy \add it\add* before the inhabitants , and before the elders of my people. If thou wilt redeem \add it\add*, redeem \add it:\add* but if thou wilt not redeem \add it, then\add* tell me, that I may know : for \add there is\add* none to redeem \add it\add* beside thee; and I \add am\add* after thee. And he said , I will redeem \add it\add*.\f + \fr 4.4 \ft I thought…: Heb. I said, I will reveal in thine ear\f*

Then said Boaz , What day thou buyest the field of the hand of Naomi , thou must buy \add it\add* also of Ruth the Moabitess , the wife of the dead , to raise up the name of the dead upon his inheritance. \p
¶ And the kinsman said , I cannot redeem \add it\add* for myself, lest I mar mine own inheritance : redeem thou my right to thyself; for I cannot redeem \add it\add*.

Now this \add was the manner\add* in former time in Israel concerning redeeming and concerning changing , for to confirm all things ; a man plucked off his shoe , and gave \add it\add* to his neighbour : and this \add was\add* a testimony in Israel.
Therefore the kinsman said unto Boaz , Buy \add it\add* for thee. So he drew off his shoe. \p

¶ And Boaz said unto the elders , and \add unto\add* all the people , Ye \add are\add* witnesses this day , that I have bought all that \add was\add* Elimelech’s , and all that \add was\add* Chilion’s and Mahlon’s , of the hand of Naomi.

Moreover Ruth the Moabitess , the wife of Mahlon , have I purchased to be my wife , to raise up the name of the dead upon his inheritance , that the name of the dead be not cut off from among his brethren , and from the gate of his place : ye \add are\add* witnesses this day.

And all the people that \add were\add* in the gate , and the elders , said , \add We are\add* witnesses. The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* make the woman that is come into thine house like Rachel and like Leah , which two did build the house of Israel : and do thou worthily in Ephratah , and be famous in Beth-lehem :\f + \fr 4.11 \ft do thou…: or, get thee riches, or, power\f*\f + \fr 4.11 \ft be famous: Heb. proclaim thy name\f*
And let thy house be like the house of Pharez , whom Tamar bare unto Judah , of the seed which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall give thee of this young woman. \p
¶ So Boaz took Ruth , and she was his wife : and when he went in unto her, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* gave her conception , and she bare a son.

And the women said unto Naomi , Blessed \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which hath not left thee this day without a kinsman , that his name may be famous in Israel.\f + \fr 4.14 \ft left…: Heb. caused to cease unto thee\f*\f + \fr 4.14 \ft kinsman: or, redeemer\f*

And he shall be unto thee a restorer of \add thy\add* life , and a nourisher of thine old age : for thy daughter in law , which loveth thee, which is better to thee than seven sons , hath born him.\f + \fr 4.15 \ft a nourisher of: Heb. to nourish\f*\f + \fr 4.15 \ft thine…: Heb. thy gray hairs\f*
And Naomi took the child , and laid it in her bosom , and became nurse unto it.
And the women her neighbours gave it a name , saying , There is a son born to Naomi ; and they called his name Obed : he \add is\add* the father of Jesse , the father of David. \p
¶ Now these \add are\add* the generations of Pharez : Pharez begat Hezron ,
And Hezron begat Ram , and Ram begat Amminadab ,
And Amminadab begat Nahshon , and Nahshon begat Salmon ,\f + \fr 4.20 \ft Salmon: or, Salmah\f*
And Salmon begat Boaz , and Boaz begat Obed ,
And Obed begat Jesse , and Jesse begat David.
